awe6.interfaces.IMessageManager

type
interface
The IMessageManager should be implemented by objects intending to fulfill Entity to Entity synchronous messaging (signals).

The interface provides an observer pattern allowing any Entity to listen to anything on any other Entity.

Instance Methods

addSubscriber<M, T>( subscriber : IEntity, message : Dynamic<addSubscriber.M>, handler : addSubscriber.M -> IEntity -> Void, ?sender : IEntity, ?senderClassType : Class<addSubscriber.T>, ?isRemovedAfterFirstSend : Bool ) : Void

getSubscribers<M, T>( ?subscriber : IEntity, ?message : Dynamic<getSubscribers.M>, ?handler : getSubscribers.M -> IEntity -> Void, ?sender : IEntity, ?senderClassType : Class<getSubscribers.T> ) : Array<IEntity>

removeSubscribers<M, T>( ?subscriber : IEntity, ?message : Dynamic<removeSubscribers.M>, ?handler : removeSubscribers.M -> IEntity -> Void, ?sender : IEntity, ?senderClassType : Class<removeSubscribers.T> ) : Void

sendMessage<M>( message : Dynamic<sendMessage.M>, sender : IEntity, ?bubbleDown : Bool, ?bubbleUp : Bool, ?bubbleEverywhere : Bool ) : Void
